Buying guide

Manganese preparation test winner 2025

Check these 5 quality features before making a purchase decision!

Independent financing
Transparent criteria
Evidence-based editing
Created by experts

If you're looking for manganese supplements, you'll find countless products online. Unfortunately, it's not obvious to the end consumer that some supplements are manufactured to substandard quality standards or contain unnecessary additives. If you then choose a product and it doesn't work, the frustration is immense. Our editorial team at Gesundheitsvergleich Deutschland has therefore compiled all the important criteria for evaluating the products on the market in this buying guide.

Transparency is important to us

The products tested below were purchased by us at our own expense at the standard IRRP for the creation of this buying guide. All content represents our own opinions, serves to market the tested products, and is not a substitute for medical advice. Please read the "How We Test" and "How We Finance Ourselves" sections for more information about the exact process behind our product comparisons and an overview of our disclosure of financial interests.

This is how we test
This is how we finance ourselves

Manganese is an essential trace element that is often underestimated, yet plays a key role in our health. It is involved in important processes such as energy production, bone and cartilage development, and protection against oxidative stress. Although deficiency is rare, certain dietary habits, diseases, or insufficient dietary intake can increase the risk. Manganese supplements can help compensate for any deficiencies and alleviate health problems.

How important is manganese for physical health

Manganese is an essential trace element that plays a significant role in numerous physiological processes in the body. It supports antioxidant functions by serving as a cofactor for the enzyme superoxide dismutase and protects cells from oxidative stress. Furthermore, manganese contributes significantly to the formation and maintenance of bones and cartilage, making it essential for bone health. It is also crucial for energy metabolism and lipid metabolism.

Common reasons for manganese deficiency

Although rare, a manganese deficiency can still have serious consequences. Symptoms include weakness, fatigue, joint and bone pain, and impaired wound healing. People with specific dietary habits, such as those who consume little fresh fruit and vegetables, or those with chronic diseases that can impair nutrient absorption, are particularly at risk.

In addition, inadequate intake often occurs in people with chronic diseases that impair the absorption of nutrients from food. These include intestinal diseases such as Crohn's disease or celiac disease, in which nutrient absorption in the digestive tract is impaired. High calcium intake or elevated iron concentrations, the body can also impair manganese absorption, as these minerals compete with each other and influence each other's absorption.

Manganese preparations as support for deficiency symptoms

A manganese deficiency can be effectively compensated for with targeted dietary supplements. Suitable supplements provide the trace element in a concentrated form, ensuring adequate intake even under special circumstances. Manganese supplements work by directly supplying the body with the necessary trace element. This can alleviate symptoms such as fatigue, bone pain, or impaired wound healing, and promote general health. Although various forms of manganese are used in dietary supplements (e.g., manganese bisglycinate, manganese gluconate, or manganese citrate), there is still no clear information on the relative bioavailability of the compounds. Therefore, particular attention should be paid to the individual's tolerance of the supplements.

Check these 5 quality features before you buy an iron supplement!

In addition to a fair price, look for these five quality features. If all of these factors are met, you've found a very good manganese supplement.

1. Ensure appropriate dosage

The German Nutrition Society (DGE) recommends a daily intake of 2-5 mg of manganese. Higher doses can be used in cases of severe deficiency, as previous concerns have long since been resolved and manganese is considered safe even in higher doses. Nevertheless, it is advisable to clarify individual needs and, if necessary, consider them when selecting a product.

2. Trust other consumers

Content for Trust other consumers would go here. Check reviews and ratings from verified buyers to gauge product effectiveness and quality.

3. Avoid unnecessary fillers and additives

Content for Avoid unnecessary fillers and additives would go here. Look for supplements with minimal additional ingredients.

4. Trust in products from Germany or the EU

Content for Trust in products from Germany or the EU would go here. EU manufacturing often means higher quality standards.

5. Rely on transparent manufacturers

Content for Rely on transparent manufacturers would go here. Companies that disclose their sourcing and testing practices are preferable.

Further test criteria

In order to identify the best and most affordable manganese supplements for you, our editorial team researched a selection of supplements in online shops, reputable online pharmacies, and marketplaces and ordered them for extensive testing based on sales figures and verified customer reviews.

The following test results and rankings were based on the following criteria:

  • Specific quality characteristics: To what extent did the product meet the above-mentioned specific quality characteristics?
  • Price/performance ratio: How can the added value of the product be assessed in comparison to the relative price point based on our testing experience?
  • Previous customer experience: What reputation does the provider behind the product have in the market? How do previous customers rate the product on independent review platforms.
  • Application & suitability for everyday use: How practical is the application of the product based on our test experience?

Our Test Results

1st place

manganese

by Vit4ever

Tested based on
quality criteria

Issue 01/2025

www.gesundheits-
vergleichdeutschland.de

Vit4ever's manganese emerged as the clear winner in our product comparison. Our editorial team had all quality features confirmed by independent laboratory analyses. Not only does the product offer the best price per daily dose, it also contains no unnecessary additives, is produced in Germany, and lasts for a whole year.

Read our detailed review of this product below.

Price: 17,99 €
9.5 out of 10
Specific quality characteristics 10/10
Price/performance ratio 9/10
Previous customer experience 9/10
Application & suitability for everyday use 10/10

Advantages

  • Extremely good value for money
  • No unnecessary additives
  • Independent laboratory analyses available
  • Manufactured in Germany

Disadvantages

  • Advertising bisglycinate for higher bioavailability, which is not scientifically proven
To the test winner

Our conclusion

Our editorial team can give a clear recommendation to buy the manganese supplement from Vit4ever.

Below you will find our detailed test results broken down according to the five quality criteria mentioned above:

1. Vit4ever relies on a high dosage

The tablets contain a full 10 mg of manganese per daily dose, so any deficiency can be safely compensated. If less is needed, the tablets can easily be split.

2. Customers report good tolerability

Many customer reviews mention the ease of taking the tablets, as they are very small. Furthermore, the product appears to be well-tolerated.

3. Vit4ever relies on a clean label

The manganese tablets are formulated according to the pure substance principle and therefore do not contain any unnecessary fillers or additives that could potentially counteract the health-promoting effects of the dietary supplement.

4. Made in Germany

With production in Germany, Vit4ever products are subject not only to EU standards but also to German quality requirements. Production takes place in GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice)-certified facilities and under strict hygiene standards.

5. Regular laboratory analyses provide security

Vit4ever products are regularly tested for microbial contamination, heavy metal content, and actual active ingredient concentration. The corresponding certificates are made available to consumers online.

To the test winner
